definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: Sense of beauty, coordination and harmony, and flexibility and diversity are requir…
sentences.chinese: 運用時要富有美感，要協調一致，要靈活多變。

sentences.english: Distance produce beauty of soliciting, floating in the air.
sentences.chinese: 距離產生美感，飄然引人遐思。

sentences.english: Burtynsky's photos reveal that, but aren't devoid of beauty.
sentences.chinese: 博廷斯基的照片揭露了這些，但並不缺乏美感。

sentences.english: I liked watching her learning curve, it was very filmic.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡看她的學習曲線，很有電影裏的美感。

sentences.english: She possessed a fine----tuned sense of beauty.
sentences.chinese: 她擁有一種細膩的美感。

sentences.english: Only writers kept alive the sense of beauty and the depth of meaning of dreams.
sentences.chinese: 只有作家能夠體會夢的美感和深刻含義。

sentences.english: Helps infuse color to a house decor to attempt to increase design beauty.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試着增加設計美感有助於爲房屋裝修注入色彩。

sentences.english: A diamond necklace adorned her neck.
sentences.chinese: 一串鑽石項鍊使她更富美感。

sentences.english: Beauty abounds in the black clouds that seem to pay homage to Table Mountain at all times.
sentences.chinese: 烏雲沉沉帶來的美感像是對桌山敬意。

sentences.english: This can improve the aesthetics, usability, and longevity of your links.
sentences.chinese: 這樣提供了你的鏈接的美感，使用性能，和壽命。

sentences.english: The theories of aesthetic experience are the central idea in ZHU Guang-qian's early aesthetical systems.
sentences.chinese: 朱光潛的“美感經驗”理論是其前期美學思想的核心。

sentences.english: Combines appropriately, for human by graceful esthetic sense.
sentences.chinese: 組合得體，給人以飄飄欲仙的美感。

sentences.english: On top of that, they offer a formal pleasure that free verse can't provide.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，它們還能提供自由詩所無的形式美感。

sentences.english: All the gifts of physical beauty have been lavished on it.
sentences.chinese: 它不吝惜在大地上展現一切身體美感的稟賦。

sentences.english: Sense of beauty, coordination and harmony, and flexibility and diversity are required in practi…
sentences.chinese: 運用時要富有美感，要協調一致，要靈活多變。

sentences.english: However, discordance is fine because it may represent the exclusive beauty.
sentences.chinese: 但格格不入是美好的，有衝突纔有美感。

definition: implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest
charm or grace (in poetry or art)
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to resemble nature itself/of the highest quality (idiom)
style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
